entry.title: Llm Opinion
entry.content: LLMs are just universal function approximators, but it turns out that those are really useful.
entry.summary: LLMs are just universal function approximators, but it turns out that those are really useful.

entry.title: Someone
entry.content: Every person is a puzzle. We get new pieces from everyone we stumble upon. The more people we love and appreciate, the more complicated our puzzle becomes. Some pieces fit; some don’t. Some we hold onto for far too long. But every single time, a piece is added. I think that’s what it means to live.
entry.summary: Every person is a puzzle. We get new pieces from everyone we stumble upon. The more people we love and appreciate, the more complicated our puzzle becomes. Some pieces fit; some don’t. Some we hold onto for far too long. But every single time, a piece is added. I think that’s what it means to live.

entry.title: Our Touch
entry.content: With our touch we have the ability to soothe the woes of the wild, yet we use it to destroy.
entry.summary: With our touch we have the ability to soothe the woes of the wild, yet we use it to destroy.

entry.title: The Real World
entry.content: You were born free. Then they gave you a name, a number, and a debt to pay. You were told what to believe, what to fear, and what to chase. You call it life. They take control.
entry.summary: You were born free. Then they gave you a name, a number, and a debt to pay. You were told what to believe, what to fear, and what to chase. You call it life. They take control.

entry.title: Your Progress
entry.content: Your progress doesn’t have to be seen, congratulated, validated by others for it to be real.
entry.summary: Your progress doesn’t have to be seen, congratulated, validated by others for it to be real.

entry.title: Fairies
entry.content: Words are like fairies, they only exist if we believe so
entry.summary: Words are like fairies, they only exist if we believe so

entry.title: Risk Takers
entry.content: The future belongs to the risk-takers, not the comfort-seekers.
entry.summary: The future belongs to the risk-takers, not the comfort-seekers.

entry.title: Nothing Is Free
entry.content: Nothing in life is free, not even advice, because you still have to pay attention.
entry.summary: Nothing in life is free, not even advice, because you still have to pay attention.

entry.title: Vast Ocean
entry.content: There is too much for any one person. It’s a vast ocean. Your goal is not to absorb the ocean through a drinking straw. Your goal is to build a raft and start sailing.
entry.summary: There is too much for any one person. It’s a vast ocean. Your goal is not to absorb the ocean through a drinking straw. Your goal is to build a raft and start sailing.

entry.title: Space Time
entry.content: If art is how we decorate space, then music is how we decorate time.
entry.summary: If art is how we decorate space, then music is how we decorate time.
